original: Lind, Ivar, disponent, Borås, f. 20/ 8/09 i Borås av fabr. Sigurd L. o. Ragna Wennberg. G. 36 m. Barbro Cajander. Barn: Orvar f. 37, Ingela 39, Marie-Louise 41. — Lärov:stud. t. 29, stud. v. Gbgs handelsinst. 29-31. Medarb. i Färgeri A-B Lind & Co. i Borås sed. 33, disp. samt styr :led. där sed. 35. V. ordf. i Borås motorklubb, sekr. i FOK Borås, medl. av Borås skyttefören. o. Par Bricole. Stud:-vlst. i Tyskl. o. Tjeckoslov. 31 o. 3’3, resor i Finl., Norge, Danm., Engl., Holl. o. Österr. Hobbies: skytte, jakt o. motorsport. Lägre årtalsBm, Hjort-skytteGm enkelskott o. Sm dubbel-skott, DuellBm, FältskytteSM.
translated: Lind, Ivar, manager, Borås, b. 20/08/1909 in Borås, son of factory owner Sigurd L. and Ragna Wennberg. Married in 1936 to Barbro Cajander. Children: Orvar b. 1937, Ingela b. 1939, Marie-Louise b. 1941. Education: upper secondary school in 1929, trade school in Gothenburg 1929-1931. Collaborator at Dyeing Company A-B Lind & Co. in Borås since 1933, manager and board member since 1935. Vice-chairman of Borås Motor Club, secretary of FOK Borås, member of Borås Shooting Association and Par Bricole. Studied in Germany and Czechoslovakia in 1931 and 1933, traveled to Finland, Norway, Denmark, England, the Netherlands, and Austria. Hobbies: shooting, hunting, and motorsports. Achievements: Lower Year Championship in Deer Shooting with single-shot and double-shot, Duelling Championship, Field Shooting Championship.

structured.name: Ivar Lind
achievements: Lower Year Championship in Deer Shooting with single-shot and double-shot
